comments.body: Isn't there a master helper for this now?  Not sufficient?

> Isn't there a master helper for this now? Not sufficient?

I wasn't aware of it, this startup boilerplate was a copy/paste of nearby tests.  Pointer to the new pattern?
https://github.com/deads2k/kubernetes/blob/remove-unprefixed-access/test/integration/utils.go#L68 but it doesn't let you override authorizer.

> https://github.com/deads2k/kubernetes/blob/remove-unprefixed-access/test/integration/utils.go#L68 but it doesn't let you override authorizer.

Ok, then insufficient.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +819,823 @@	defer s.Close()

	m = master.New(&master.Config{
		DatabaseStorage:       etcdStorage,
		KubeletClient:         client.FakeKubeletClient{},

@@ -1,1 +395,399 @@		APIPrefix:             "/api",
		// enable v1beta3 if we are testing that api version.
		EnableV1Beta3:    testapi.Version() == "v1beta3",
		Authorizer:       apiserver.NewAlwaysAllowAuthorizer(),
		AdmissionControl: admit.NewAlwaysAdmit(),

comments.body:
Extra data added to all requests.  Sprintf adds extra data if you send a value and there's no format, so the substitution, while empty, is necessary.
